problem_names: lemma invert_order_compare_real[simp]: "\<And> x y :: real. invert_order (compare x y) = compare y x"
translations: lemma invert_order_compare_real[simp]: "\<And> x y :: real. invert_order (compare x y) = compare y x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y. invert_order (compare x y) = compare y x
